title: Victory Day: Free health camp for cardiac patients held in city
body: A free health camp for cardiac treatment was held in the capital on Tuesday to mark Victory Day and to contribute to public healthcare. The health camp was organised by cardiac surgeon Dr Muhammad Ali Bhuiyan and interventional cardiologist Dr Fauzia Khan, said a press release. The charitable event took place at Priyo Ma Pharmacy on RK Mission Road. More than 50 cardiac patients received free medical consultations, necessary tests, and treatments during the camp. The initiative received an enthusiastic response from the local community, reflecting a strong commitment to public health improvement and the true spirit of Victory Day. The organisers expressed sincere gratitude to all those who extended assistance and emphasized the importance of raising public awareness about heart disease and the value of preventive cardiac care.
